segments.text: I see the woman standing in that puddle, and it’s just sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on drying that plate, and it’s like she’s in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and I feel bad for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be really upset when she sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s just a matter of time before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just help her out already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just depressing to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
